mil7.4.10:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘cakkavattissa cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni cattāri aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.4.10:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, cakkavattī catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ saṅgaṇhāti;
mil7.4.10:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena catassannaṃ parisānaṃ mānasaṃ saṅgahetabbaṃ anuggahetabbaṃ sampahaṃsetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.10:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.10:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa vijite corā na uṭṭhahanti;
mil7.4.10:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kāmarāgabyāpādavihiṃsāvitakkā na uppādetabbā.
mil7.4.10:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.10:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattī divase divase samuddapariyantaṃ mahāpathaviṃ anuyāyati kalyāṇapāpakāni vicinamāno;
mil7.4.10:8.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ divase divase paccavekkhitabbaṃ ‘kiṃ nu kho me imehi tīhi ṭhānehi anupavajjassa divaso vītivattatī’ti.
mil7.4.10:8.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.10:9.1: ‘Kathambhūtassa me rattindivā vītivattantīti pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabban’ti.
mil7.4.10:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa abbhantarabāhirārakkhā susaṃvihitā hoti;
mil7.4.10:10.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena abbhantarānaṃ bāhirānaṃ kilesānaṃ ārakkhāya satidovāriko ṭhapetabbo.
mil7.4.10:10.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, cakkavattissa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.4.10:11.1: ‘Satidovāriko, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako akusalaṃ pajahati kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti, suddhamattānaṃ pariharatī’”ti.
